sentences.sContent: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.sContent_eng: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.sCn: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.sContent: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.sContent_eng: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.sCn: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.sContent: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.sCn: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

phrases.pCn: 近似值，近似价值；概算价值
近似数，近似值；大概的数目

remMethod.val: ap + proxim(接近) + ate → 接近的 → 近似的

trans.tranOther: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it
